channel.title: AltcoinTrading.NET Weekly Roundup
channel.description: Oh would you look at that. We didn't set any cute relevant intro for the email blast this week! It's probably because we are crypto bazzillionaires and so we don't give a flying eff about the state of our website! -- Just kidding, we probably just fucked something up. Keep it real, believe in Satoshi and follow us on Twitter @altcointrading_. What we do: ATNET cryptocurrency trading strategies and hodl strategies, the best tools for crypto trading and basic crypto OPSEC guides. Follow us on Twitter @altcointrading_

item.title: What's Been Going On This Week
item.description: This week's Newsblade top picks from around the cryptointernets.
item.author: news@altcointrading.net
item.dc:creator: KarlvonBahnhof, info@altcointrading.net
item.content:encoded:
More of practical discussion in anonymizing Bitcoin transactions via coinjoin and similar (Bitcoin-Dev mailing list in January 2019)

[Read it]

ICE Updated their Bakkt specs page

[Read it]

Asian dApp games are rife with Chinese New Year deals

[Read it]

Tradeblock compares centralized vs non-custodial exchanges in terms of traded volume, fees and regulations

[Read it]

Amazon Partners On New Ethereum Marketplace For Enterprises / via @forbes

[Read it]

Blockstream proposes a centralized solution to BTC fragmented liquidity - sidechain where tx are validated by big trading houses lie Bitfinex, OKCoin or Rock Trading / via @forbes

[Read it]

Tooling for crypto traders - Reddit Sentiment Analysis with link to full code so that you can literally $DYOR. By @rados_io

item.content:encoded:
Altcoin Exchanges: Where to buy and trade crypto in 2020?

Updated at 27 Aug 2020, 08:07 UTC in #TRADING-PLATFORMS - Where to buy crypto and where to trade it? Which exchanges are liquid, which have issues and which look like exit scam? Updated 2020.

[Read it]

Altcoin Wallets: Tried and True, 2020 Updated

Updated at 27 Aug 2020, 06:48 UTC in #CRYPTOCURRENCY-WALLETS - Where to store cryptocurrencies? Best ERC20 cold storage? See a list of altcoin wallets including multicoin wallets, web based wallets and hardware wallets.

[Read it]
